name: Within Bastet's Cavern
description:
The shrine within Bastet’s Cavern has been tampered with, you must platform your way to the shrine and bring normality and safety back to your local town.  Along the way you will have to deal with a varying and dangerous landscape as well as movement changing environments. Combine everything you learn together.

Within Bastet's Cavern is a 2D Platformer where the player must use pltform and their movement abilities to reach the cave as quick as possible and collecting hidden cat bells along the way

This game was created as a mobile phone mechanical demo  game for a University project

Controls

Joystick - Move Left/Right

Up Button - Jump

Up Button x2 - Double Jump

Dash Button - Dash

You can also Wall Jump by moving the joystick and pressing the jump key and Wall Slide by staying on the side of a wall

Credits
Zak- Producer
